questions.question: What does the 'typeof' operator do in JavaScript?
options: It returns the data type of a variable.
It checks if a variable is defined.
It converts a variable to a string.
questions.answer: It returns the data type of a variable.

questions.question: How do you declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is the correct way to create a function in JavaScript?
What does the 'push' method do in JavaScript arrays?
options: It adds a new element to the end of an array.
It removes the last element from an array.
It adds a new element to the beginning of an array.
It creates a copy of the array.
questions.answer: It adds a new element to the end of an array.

questions.question: How do you create an object in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the 'return' statement in a function?
options: To exit the function and return a value.
To log a message to the console.
questions.answer: To exit the function and return a value.

questions.question: Which of the following is a valid way to declare a constant in JavaScript?
How do you add a comment in JavaScript?
options: // This is a comment; /* This is a comment */
